meta_description_home: Discover the best top charts and albums on ZeffyrMusic. Listen to millions of tracks for free and without ads, unlimited. Create and share your playlists now!
meta_description_top: Discover the Top Charts of ZeffyrMusic and listen to the hits of the moment for free. Explore the best songs and albums streaming right now!
meta_description_albums: Discover the 50 most popular albums of the moment on ZeffyrMusic. Listen to the best new releases and classics for free streaming right now!
title_home: Listen to Free Music Without Ads - ZeffyrMusic
title_top: Top Charts - ZeffyrMusic | Listen to the Hits of the Moment
title_albums: Top 50 Albums of the Moment - ZeffyrMusic | Listen Now
inscription_description: Sign up and take advantage of ZeffyrMusic. Save your favorite playlists, create new playlists, and look at from anywhere. All for free.
inscription_succes: Congratulations you are registered. Now go to all the features on Zeffyr Music.

help_description_directory: Find practical tips and answers to common questions to make the most of Zeffyr Music. Easily access information on managing your account, playlists, and other features.
help_meta_title: Directory of Tips and Tutorials - Zeffyr Music
help_meta_description: Discover our directory of tips and tutorials. Find practical guides and advice to help you get the most out of our services. Explore now!
help_install_android_title: How to add this website to your Android home screen
help_install_android_description: Discover how to add this website to your Android home screen using Google Chrome or Samsung Internet. Follow our simple guides for quick and easy access.
help_install_android_chrome_title: How to add this website from Google Chrome to your home screen
help_install_android_chrome_content_1: Open Google Chrome and go to the website.
help_install_android_chrome_content_2: Tap the three vertical dots button at the top right corner of the screen.
help_install_android_chrome_content_4: Tap Add to transfer it to the home screen.
help_install_android_chrome_content_5: If you go back to your screen, you will see the icon. You will also see the Chrome icon attached, which means you cannot access this shortcut in another browser.
help_install_android_samsung_title: How to add this website from Samsung Internet to your home screen
help_install_android_samsung_content_1: If you’re using a Samsung device, your default browser may be the Samsung Internet Browser. There is a slight difference from Google Chrome, depending on the browser’s style.
help_install_android_samsung_content_2: Go to the website on Samsung Internet.
help_install_android_samsung_content_3: Tap the Hamburger icon at the bottom right corner of the screen. The menu options will appear.
help_install_android_samsung_content_4: From the menu, select the Add page to button.
help_install_ios_title: How to add this website to your iPhone home screen
help_install_ios_description: Learn how to add this website to your iPhone's home screen using Safari. Follow our simple guide for quick and convenient access to your favorite site right from your home screen.
help_install_ios_content_1: The iPhone differs from Android because it doesn’t matter if the website has an app. You can still add it as an icon.
help_install_ios_content_2: After going to the website via Safari, tap the Share menu button.
help_install_ios_content_3: In the menu, scroll down and select Add to Home Screen.
help_install_ios_content_4: If you want, edit the site’s title as it will appear on your screen.
help_install_ios_content_5: When everything is to your satisfaction, tap Add.
help_install_ios_content_6: The icon is now there, ready to use. However, when you tap the icon, the website will only open in Safari.
help_screen_locked_title: How to keep playing music on mobile with screen locked
help_screen_locked_description: Discover how to continue listening to music on your mobile with the screen locked. Follow our guide to enjoy your music on ZeffyrMusic while saving your phone's battery.
help_screen_locked_content_1: Preface: When you exit the music player app on your mobile device, the music usually stops automatically. This can be problematic if you want to continue listening to music with the screen locked, for example, when you're on the go or looking to save battery life. This tutorial will show you how to overcome this issue and continue playing music with the screen locked.
help_screen_locked_step_1_content: Open the web browser on your mobile phone and go to ZeffyrMusic.
help_screen_locked_step_2_title: Step 2: Select the music to play
help_screen_locked_step_2_content: Choose the song, album, or playlist you want to listen to on ZeffyrMusic.
help_screen_locked_step_3_content: Tap the play button to start playing the music.
help_screen_locked_step_4_content: Once the music is playing, press the power button on your phone to lock the screen. This button is usually located on the side or top of your phone.
help_screen_locked_step_5_content: To resume playing the music from the locked screen, press the power button to wake up the screen. Then, you can see the playback controls on the locked screen of your phone. Swipe your finger to unlock the screen if necessary.
help_screen_locked_step_6_content: Use the playback controls available on your phone's screen to control the music. You should see buttons to play, pause, skip to the next track, or go back to the previous track.
help_screen_locked_step_7_content: You have now successfully continued playing your music on your mobile phone while locking the screen and resumed it from there. Enjoy your music wherever you are!
help_screen_locked_tips: Tip: Playing music with the screen locked can help save battery life on your phone, as the screen is one of the main battery consumers.
help_img_android_chrome_2: Add to Home Screen Option on Chrome Android
help_img_android_chrome_4: Zeffyr Music Icon on Android Home Screen
help_img_android_samsung_2: Add Page to Option on Samsung Internet
help_img_android_samsung_4: Zeffyr Music Icon Installed on Samsung
help_img_ios_2: Add to Home Screen Option on iOS
help_img_ios_3: Add to Home Screen Confirmation on iOS
help_img_ios_4: Zeffyr Music Icon on iOS Home Screen
help_listen_title: How to listen to music on Zeffyr Music
help_listen_description: Discover how to listen to music on Zeffyr Music. Find songs, albums and playlists, and learn how to control playback to fully enjoy your music experience.
help_listen_step_1_title: Search for a Song or Playlist
help_listen_step_1_content1: Use the search bar to find an artist, album, or song.
help_listen_step_2_content1: Click on a song to play it instantly.
help_listen_step_2_content2: Press play on a playlist or album to listen continuously.
help_listen_step_3_content1: Use the play/pause, next, and previous buttons to navigate.
help_listen_step_3_content2: Adjust the volume with the built-in player.
help_listen_step_3_content3: Use the player options to enable shuffle, repeat, or switch to full-screen mode.
help_legal_description: Discover if Zeffyr Music is a legal service and how it respects copyright. Learn more about the platform's legality and how it works.
help_legal_content: Yes, Zeffyr Music is a legal service.
help_legal_step_1_content: Zeffyr Music does not store or distribute music files. The platform streams official videos directly from YouTube while complying with YouTube’s policies.
help_legal_step_2_content1: All content comes from YouTube, which manages copyright with creators and rights holders.
help_legal_step_2_content2: Zeffyr Music does not modify videos or allow downloads, ensuring compliance with existing licenses.
help_legal_step_2_content3: The integration of videos follows YouTube’s terms of use.
help_legal_step_2_content4: By using Zeffyr Music, you enjoy an optimized listening experience while respecting legal requirements.
help_download_description: Find out if you can download music on Zeffyr Music. Learn why downloading is not available and how to enjoy music streaming on the platform.
help_download_content: No, Zeffyr Music does not allow downloading music as MP3 files or any other format.
help_download_step_1_content1: Respect for copyright laws: The music comes from YouTube, which manages licenses with artists and rights holders.
help_download_step_1_content2: Compliance with YouTube’s policies: Zeffyr Music streams videos in accordance with YouTube’s terms of service, which prohibit downloading without authorization.
help_download_step_1_content3: A fully legal service: Our goal is to provide a music streaming experience while fully respecting legal regulations.
help_download_step_1_content4: Zeffyr Music is designed for online listening only, without downloads.
help_issues_description: Having trouble with Zeffyr Music? Here's how to solve the most common issues. Find solutions for login, playlist, and favorites problems.
help_issues_content: Having trouble with Zeffyr Music? Here’s how to solve the most common issues.
help_issues_step_1_title: Can’t log in or lost account
help_issues_step_1_content1: Check your credentials: Make sure your email and password are correct.
help_issues_step_1_content2: Reset your password: Use the "Forgot password" option to create a new one.
help_issues_step_1_content3: Clear cookies and cache: Try clearing your browser cache and enabling cookies if needed.
help_issues_step_1_content4: Use a compatible browser: Zeffyr Music works best with the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, and Edge.
help_issues_step_2_content1: Missing playlist: Ensure you are logged into the correct account.
help_issues_step_2_content2: Unable to add or remove songs: Check your internet connection and try again.
help_issues_step_2_content3: Changes not saved: Refresh the page or log out and back in to check if your changes were applied.
help_issues_step_3_content1: Like not saved: Wait a few seconds, then refresh the page.
help_issues_step_3_content2: Missing favorites: Make sure you are logged into your account.
help_issues_step_3_content3: Persistent issues: Try logging out and back in.
help_issues_step_4_content: If the issue continues, wait a moment and try again later.
reset_password_pass_size: Password must be at least 6 characters long
reset_password_invalid: Your password could not be reset. Please check the reset link in your email.
reset_password_success: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in with your new password.
